content.title: Intro
content.content:
1971
Preceded by
1971
1972
Year
1973
Followed by
1973

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1972.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - Actress Jennifer Hale is born.
2 - In honour of his 80th birthday the following day, The Sunday Times Magazine runs an interview of William Cater with J.R.R. Tolkien, "The Lord of the Legends".
3 - J.R.R. Tolkien celebrates his 80th birthday.
3 - The Tolkien Society wishes J.R.R. Tolkien a happy 80th birthday in The Times.
3 - The Tolkien Society sends Tolkien a jar of tobacco as a birthday present.
15 - The Tolkien Society holds a general meeting and becomes formally constituted.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 332.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his grandson Michael George Tolkien.

content.title: February
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Dorothy Wood.
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Edmund R. Meskys
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Vera Chapman and the Tolkien Society.
9 - Actor Crispin Freeman is born.
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Fay Darrington.
26 - Actor Keith Ferguson is born.

content.title: March
content.content:
16 - Tolkien writes letter 333.
27 - Rayner Unwin organizes a party in celebration of J.R.R. Tolkien's CBE the following day.
28 - At Buckingham Palace, J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed a CBE by Queen Elizabeth II.
29 - Actor Samuel Hazeldine is born.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 334.

content.title: April
content.content:
19 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Eva Heilborn.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs Robertson.

content.title: May
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Donna Sadlier.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 335.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 336.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 337.

content.title: June
content.content:
3 - J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the University of Oxford.
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 338.
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 338a.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Robert Burchfield.
27 - Vera Chapman meets J.R.R. Tolkien. He agrees to become The Tolkien Society's Honorary President.
30 - Mythcon 3 begins.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 339.

content.title: July
content.content:
4 - Mythcon 3 ends.
4 - Letter 339 is published in the Daily Telegraph.
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 339a.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 340.
27 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a certificate of authenticity for the sale of his desk.

content.title: October
content.content:
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.
21 - Actor Felix Felton dies.
? - Master of Middle-earth: The Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien's desk is sold at Sotheby's.
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 342.
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 343.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 343a.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 344.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 345.

content.title: December
content.content:
13 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 346.
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 347.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien returns to Oxford and rooms at Merton College.
? - Tolkien receives an honorary doctorate from Oxford University.
? - The Swedish Tolkien Society Forodrim is founded.
? - Scholar Anne C. Petty presents her Ph.D. thesis The Creative Mythology of J.R.R. Tolkien: A Study of the Mythic Impulse.
? - Scholar Stefan Ekman is born.
? - A Glossary of the Eldarin Tongues is published.
? - The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1973 released.
? - Mallorn 5 is published.
Years
1969 1970 1971 1972 1973 1974 1975
